item.title: GlobalFoundries 第三季度调整后利润低于预期，库存问题持续存在
item.description: GlobalFoundries 周二公布的第二季度收入略高于华尔街预期，但预计第三季度调整后利润低于预期，表明芯片需求的复苏速度低于预期。【原文：GlobalFoundries marginally beat Wall Street expectations for second quarter revenue on Tuesday but forecast third-quarter adjusted profit below expectations, indicating a slower-than-anticipated recovery in chip demand.】

item.title: 又有两名 Wirecard 高管因会计丑闻被起诉
item.description: 德国慕尼黑检察官办公室周二发表声明称，德国检察官已对另外两名前 Wirecard 高管提出指控，从而扩大了对德国最大企业丑闻之一的调查范围。【原文：German prosecutors have charged another two former Wirecard executives, according to a statement from their Munich office on Tuesday, casting their net wider in investigations into one of Germany's biggest corporate scandals.】

item.title: 对高等级信贷和政府债券的需求带动 MarketAxess 利润增长
item.description: MarketAxess Holdings 周二表示，由于高等级公司债券和政府债券交易活跃，该公司第二季度利润增长了 8%。【原文：MarketAxess Holdings' second-quarter profit rose 8% due to robust trading activity in high-grade corporate debt and government bonds, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在线券商 Futu 和 UP Fintech 暂停美股夜盘交易
item.description: 以帮助中国投资者购买全球股市而闻名的在线券商富途控股（Futu Holdings）和万国金融科技控股公司（UP Fintech Holding）已告知客户，在全球市场波动加剧后，美股夜盘交易将于周二暂停。【原文：Online brokerages Futu Holdings and UP Fintech Holding , known for helping Chinese investors buy global stocks, have told clients that night trading of U.S. shares would be suspended on Tuesday after a surge in global market volatility.】

item.title: 字节跳动推出人工智能视频应用，加入 OpenAI 的 Sora 竞争对手行列
item.description: 字节跳动公司（ByteDance）扩大了其可根据文字提示生成视频的软件产品，加入了越来越多的中国科技公司的行列，进军这一新兴市场。【原文：ByteDance has expanded its offering of a software that can generate videos based on text prompts, joining a growing number of Chinese tech firms entering an emerging market also targeted by ChatGPT creator OpenAI.】

item.title: Starboard 推动欧特克董事会研究更换首席执行官和削减成本事宜
item.description: 周二，激进投资者 Starboard Value 在一份报告中称，Starboard Value 一直在与欧特克董事会接触，继续推动改善这家设计软件制造商的运营和财务业绩。【原文：Starboard Value has been engaging with the board of Autodesk , continuing its push to improve the design software maker's operations and financial performance, the activist investor said in a presentation on Tuesday.】

item.title: 乔比航空公司申请澳大利亚飞机认证
item.description: 电动空中出租车制造商乔比航空公司（Joby Aviation）周二表示，该公司已正式申请其飞机在澳大利亚的使用认证。【原文：Electric air taxi maker Joby Aviation said on Tuesday the it has formally applied for its aircraft to be certified for use in Australia.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，塔可钟母公司百胜餐饮集团销售额下滑
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团（Yum Brands）公布的第二季度同店销售额降幅大于预期，原因是通货膨胀严重阻碍了低收入美国人外出就餐消费。【原文：Yum Brands reported a bigger-than-expected fall in same-store sales for the second quarter as sticky inflation discouraged lower-income Americans from spending on dining out.】

item.title: 优步第二季度营收超预期，得益于共享出行需求旺盛
item.description: 周二，优步（Uber）第二季度营收和核心利润均超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于市场对其共享乘车和食品配送服务的稳定需求，该公司股价在收盘前上涨了 5%。【原文：Uber beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue and core profit on Tuesday, helped by steady demand for its ride-sharing and food-delivery services, sending the company's shares up 5% before the bell.】

item.title: 李施德林生产商健维因基本保健产品销售强劲而超出预期
item.description: 肯维周二公布的第二季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其基本保健产品部门的销售额好于预期，该部门销售的品牌包括创可贴、李施德林和无忧。【原文：Kenvue beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, helped primarily by better-than-expected sales in its essential health products unit that sells brands including Band-Aid, Listerine and Carefree.】

item.title: 牛油果淘金热将美国公司与墨西哥的森林砍伐灾难联系在一起
item.description: 七月一个闷热的下午，在墨西哥中部米却肯州马德罗小镇附近，两辆黄色的大型推土机在一片郁郁葱葱的鳄梨果园底部掘进棕色的土壤。【原文：On a sweltering July afternoon, two large yellow bulldozers dug into the brown soil at the bottom of a lush avocado orchard near the small town of Madero, located in central Mexico's Michoacan state.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒调整后利润因需求恢复而增长
item.description: 本周二，卡特彼勒公布季度调整后利润增长，原因是在美国基础设施支出增加的背景下，市场对其大型挖掘机和其他建筑设备的需求保持强劲。【原文：Caterpillar reported a rise in quarterly adjusted profit on Tuesday, lifted by resilient demand for its larger excavators and other construction equipment against the backdrop of increased infrastructure spending in the U.S.】

item.title: Robinhood 第二季度将受益于 meme 股票复兴和加密货币交易
item.description: 华尔街预计，随着散户投资者涌入罗宾hood的免佣金应用程序交易所谓的 "meme 股票 "和加密货币，该公司第二季度的营收将创下历史新高。【原文：Wall Street expects Robinhood's revenue to hit record highs in the second quarter as retail investors flock to its commission-free app to trade so-called 'meme stocks' and cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 美国将为国家电网投资 22 亿美元
item.description: 美国能源部周二表示，将投资 22 亿美元用于国家电网，在 18 个州实施 8 个项目，以抵御日益严重的极端天气事件威胁、降低成本并提高发电能力。【原文：The United States Department of Energy on Tuesday said it is investing $2.2 billion in the nation's power grid for eight projects across 18 states to protect against growing threats of extreme weather events, lower costs, and catalyze additional capacity.】

item.title: 美国市场过山车，日经指数反弹 10
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：关税迫在眉睫，锋利笔制造商纽威将更多业务迁出中国
item.description: 由于在美国总统大选前面临关税的 "不确定性"，锋利笔制造商纽威品牌公司（Newell Brands）首席执行官克里斯-彼得森（Chris Peterson）在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司正在将厨房用具的生产迁出中国，并将书写业务的生产迁往田纳西州。【原文：Sharpie pen maker Newell Brands is moving production of kitchen appliances out of China and has relocated manufacturing for its writing business to Tennessee as it faces "uncertainty" on tariffs ahead of the U.S. presidential election, Newell CEO Chris Peterson said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 跨山管道扩容未能提升加拿大重油价格
item.description: 跨山石油管道扩建（TMX）的目的是缩小加拿大石油相对于美国原油的折扣，但三个月后的差价比该项目开始商业运营时还要大。【原文：The Trans Mountain oil pipeline expansion (TMX) was meant to shrink the discount on Canadian oil versus U.S. crude but three months in the differential is wider than when commercial operations on the project started.】

item.title: 美国运输安全委员会就波音 737 MAX 9 中空紧急事件举行听证会
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会将就今年 1 月阿拉斯加航空公司一架 737 MAX 9 门塞在空中发生的客舱面板爆裂事件向波音公司、Spirit AeroSystems 公司和联邦航空管理局的主要证人提问。【原文：The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board will question key witnesses from Boeing , Spirit AeroSystems and the Federal Aviation Administration on the mid-air cabin panel blowout of an Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 door plug in January.】

item.title: 美联储加息言论利好期货市场
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货反弹，原因是美联储官员发表的鸽派利率评论有助于提振市场情绪，而且投资者在前一交易日大跌后开始寻找低价股。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rebounded on Tuesday as dovish rate commentary from Federal Reserve officials helped lift the mood and investors looked for bargains after a rout in the previous session.】

item.title: 中国华为与北汽推出首款联合开发的电动汽车
item.description: 中国科技企业集团华为和北汽集团周二推出了双方联合开发的首款电动汽车（EV）。【原文：Chinese technology conglomerate Huawei and BAIC Motor on Tuesday launched their first jointly developed electric vehicle (EV).】

item.title: 美国将为 SK Hynix 在美国的芯片封装厂提供高达 4.5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，计划向 SK Hynix 提供高达 4.5 亿美元的拨款，用于资助其在印第安纳州的先进封装工厂和人工智能产品研发机构。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Tuesday it plans to award SK Hynix up to $450 million in grants to help fund an advanced packaging plant and research and development facility for artificial intelligence products in Indiana.】

item.title: 约三分之一的碳信用额未通过新基准测试
item.description: 自愿碳市场董事会周二表示，约三分之一的现有碳信用额未达到旨在作为全球自愿碳市场基准的新标准的标准。【原文：Around third of existing carbon credits have failed to meet criteria for a new standard that aims to serve as the global benchmark for the voluntary carbon market, its board said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲股市从惨烈抛售中反弹
item.description: 周二，欧洲股市在上一交易日触及六个月低点后反弹，与亚洲市场的复苏形成共振，并在一定程度上受到大量企业财报的提振。【原文：European shares rebounded on Tuesday after hitting six-month lows in the previous session, resonating a recovery across Asian markets, and buoyed in part by a plethora of corporate earnings.】

item.title: Adecco 首席执行官称美国科技行业招聘可能已触底，但仍未出现好转
item.description: 在投资者的担忧引发美国股市大跌一天之后，全球人才派遣公司 Adecco 周二表示，美国科技行业招聘量的下降可能已经跌入低谷。【原文：Global staffing firm Adecco said on Tuesday that falling hiring volumes in the U.S. tech sector had probably hit a trough, a day after investor concerns triggered a massive rout on the markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行排除近期降息可能
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长周二排除了在短期内降息的可能性，称政策必须保持限制性，以抑制顽固的核心通胀。【原文：The head of Australia's central bank on Tuesday ruled out rate cuts in the near term, saying policy had to remain restrictive to bring stubborn core inflation to heel.】

item.title: 英国多米诺比萨公司预计利润将低于市场预期
item.description: 英国多米诺比萨集团（Domino's Pizza Group）周二预计，受年初生活成本危机导致产品销售放缓的影响，其年度利润将低于市场预期。【原文：Britain's Domino's Pizza Group on Tuesday forecast its annual profit to be at the lower-end of market expectations, pressured by a slowdown for its products at the start of the year amid a cost-of-living crisis.】

item.title: 假日酒店集团第二季度每间客房收入增长 3.2
item.description: 假日酒店所有者洲际酒店集团（InterContinental Hotels Group）报告称，由于美国市场的强劲反弹抵消了中国市场的疲软，第二季度每间可用客房收入（RevPAR）增长了 3.2%。【原文：Holiday Inn-owner InterContinental Hotels Group reported a 3.2% rise in revenue per available room (RevPAR) in the second quarter as a strong rebound in the United States offset weakness in China.】

item.title: 软银第一季度利润微薄，回购潜力受关注
item.description: 日本软银集团（SoftBank Group）预计将于本周三公布第一季度小幅盈利报告，但投资者将密切关注这家科技投资巨头是否会宣布进行大规模股票回购或表示愿意进行股票回购。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group is expected to report a modest first-quarter profit on Wednesday but investors are set to hone in on whether the tech investment giant will either announce a major share buyback or flag its willingness to embark on one.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司第二季度利润下降 3.4%，原因是销量和炼油利润率下降
item.description: 石油巨头沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）周二报告称，由于原油产量下降和炼油利润下滑，第二季度利润下降了 3.4%。【原文：Oil giant Saudi Aramco on Tuesday reported a 3.4% fall in second-quarter profit on lower crude volumes and softer refining margins.】

item.title: 受全球贸易好转提振，中国 7 月出口出现增长：路透社民意调查
item.description: 中国 7 月份的出口可能加速攀升，因为制造商受益于全球商品贸易持续回暖带来的订单增加，预计这将使出口保持强劲，并消除关税恐慌。【原文：China's exports likely climbed at a quicker pace in July as manufacturers benefited from stronger orders from the ongoing upturn in the global merchandise trade, which is expected to keep exports robust and dull tariff scares.】
